definitions.definition: A metal bar fixed between, and at right angles to , the blade and the handle of a sword or other bladed weapon that stops an opponent 's similar weapon from sliding along the blade and injuring the hand of the person wielding the sword.

main_definition: ( swords ) A metal bar fixed between, and at right angles to , the blade and the handle of a sword or other bladed weapon that stops an opponent 's similar weapon from sliding along the blade and injuring the hand of the person wielding the sword.
